channel.title: What am i suposed to do at this point of...(look please)
channel.description:
ok.. i read the sticky at the top of the page and i went to portforward.com and now i need to know what program im suposed to portforward... what porgram to i pick? please help....
*EDIT*
I went to portforward.com and i did the first thing and i did everything it seys but when i click to host my server and have everything filled out it seys my server is offline when its online... any help? is there naything else im suposed to portforward? plz help...

item.title: What am i suposed to do at this point of...(look please)

item.source: What am i suposed to do at this point of...(look please)

item.title: What am i suposed to do at this point of...(look please)
item.dc:creator: @Rshacker112 Rshacker112
item.description:
@Rshacker112 wrote:

You need to let it through your firewall. None of the portforwarding tutorials tell you how.
So do this!
Clcik the start button. On the right side you should see control panel. Click that.
Now once it’s open go over to the left and click classic mode/ view. I don’t remember what it says.
Now go down to windows firewall and double-click it or right click it then open.
Clcik the change settings button and then click the exceptions tab at the top in the middle. Go down near the bottom and click on add port.
The port name needs to be Private Server or the same name of the name in the portforward box in your router. Set the port to 43594 and click TCP. Clcik OK and you’re done!!! Your server should work! If you have any questions feel free to ask!

Read full topic
